definitions.define: No shipping available to the selected country
The shipping rate cannot be determined at this time

Countries - Comma separated list of two character ISO country codes that are part of the zone
Cost - Shipping rates to the zone destinations based on a group of maximum order weights. Example: 3:8.50,7:10.50,... Weights less than or equal to 3 would cost 8.50 for the zone destinations.
Handling - Handling Fee for the zone
